title: Infection Town of Zombies
description: Infection Town of Zombies is a casual game where you become the boss of Zombie and destroy humans! Lead the ultimate Zombie Horde in a chaotic showdown! Control a powerful zombie and infect the humans to become your army. Upgrade your character and mutated zombies for maximum devastation. Battle civilians, policemen, and soldiers, each with unique fighting styles. Customize your strategy and conquer the city!
